feature1.explanation: Both texts use commas and periods appropriately for sentence structure.

feature2.explanation: Different word choices and grammatical structures are observed in the texts, affecting lexical and grammatical features.

feature3.explanation: Text 2 has longer and more complex sentences compared to Text 1, impacting sentence structure and quantitative features.

feature4.explanation: Text 1 is more formal and informational in tone, while Text 2 is more conversational and critical, differing in narrative styles and tone.

feature5.explanation: No spelling or typographical errors were detected in either text.

overall.explanation: Considering the differences in lexical and grammatical features, sentence structure, and narrative tone, the likelihood of the two texts being written by the same author is moderate.
